{{Infobox_jseries | product_name = J4300 Router | product_image = [[Image:J4300_Front.jpg|200px|]] | rackspace = 2U | slots = 6 Wan | bandwidth = 16 Mbit/s 80 kpps| power = Non-redundant| memory = 256/512MB | flash = 128MB/256MB/512MB/1GB | }}
==== Some throughput test results: ====
Test 1: Full traffic mesh between all 14 ports:
4300 Mb/s PPS ------------------------ 64b 33.62 65670 128b 48.93 47785 256b 95.40 46582 512b 172.69 42161 1028b 193.75 23559 1280b 195.29 19071 1580b 194.86 15416 64-1514 187.97 29810
Test 2: In/Out same PIM for all 14 ports:
4300 Mb/s PPS ------------------------ 64b 21.92 42813 128b 44.22 43179 256b 86.53 42249 512b 164.17 40080 1028b 224.83 27338 1280b 226.79 22147 1580b 226.19 17895 64-1514 216.42 35213
